## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to meet forecasted demand, considering a margin of error, and optimize inventory turnover. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units less than the player's planned purchase,  while still exceeding the discount threshold. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~2.4 days                               |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | ~6.3 days                               |
| Comments                          | The order quantity allows for flexibility in covering any potential demand fluctuations. |
